argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | abeqri.1 | |- { x | ph } = A |
| 2 |  | #P_abid | |- ( x e. { x | ph } <-> ph ) |
| 3 | 1 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( x e. { x | ph } <-> x e. A ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_bitr3i | |- ( ph <-> x e. A ) |
\
 Obsolete proof of ~ abeq1i as of 15-Nov-2019.  (Contributed by NM, 31-Jul-1994.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
